## StabilityDeposit class

A Stability Deposit and its accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class StabilityDeposit 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `StabilityDeposit` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [collateralGain](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of native currency (e.g. Ether) received in exchange for the used-up ARTH. |
|  [currentARTH](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.currentarth.md) |  | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of ARTH left in the Stability Deposit. |
|  [frontendTag](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.frontendtag.md) |  | string | Address of frontend through which this Stability Deposit was made. |
|  [initialARTH](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.initialarth.md) |  | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of ARTH in the Stability Deposit at the time of the last direct modification. |
|  [isEmpty](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.isempty.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [mahaReward](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.mahareward.md) |  | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of MAHA rewarded since the last modification of the Stability Deposit. |
